apoc.generate.distribution

Class SimpleDegreeDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • apoc.generate.distribution.SimpleDegreeDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DegreeDistribution
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DistributionBasedConfig, MutableSimpleDegreeDistribution

    public class SimpleDegreeDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements DegreeDistribution
    Simple DegreeDistribution where the node degrees can be directly passed into the constructor.

      • passesHavelHakimiTest

        protected final boolean passesHavelHakimiTest()
        Havel-Hakimi is a recursive alternative to the Erdos-Gallai condition. This is a looped implementation, the algorithm is recursive in nature, but recursion is slower.

        Kept as a backup, might be useful as a replacement for E-G eventually.

        Returns:
        true iff passes.
